Name: Fernanda Aracelly
description:
Fernanda, age 24, is a single mother and seeks to get her child ahead. She has hardly any primary education and the only way for her to earn a living is agricultural work.

She seeks a loan to cover the cost of buying mulch and fertilizers to grow onions. This will permit her to have a good harvest that, at time of sale, will generate profits to be able to provide for her child and to increase her working capital.
